overview: Mr. Cloyed joined Calvert in February 1998 and serves as National Sales Manager. Prior to joining Calvert, he was President of Berger Distributors, Inc. and Chief Marketing Officer for Berger Associates, Inc., where he oversaw the sales and marketing to all distribution channels. Before Berger, he spent six years as Director of the Institutional Division and global partner of Invesco Funds Group where he founded and grew the institutional group to $6 billion in assets, in addition to establishing various sales groups and internal infrastructure. In total, Mr. Cloyed has more than 30 years of sales and marketing experience in the financial services industry.
